mapper.select: select p.S_BRAND_NAME S_BRAND_NAME,p.P_NAME_1 P_NAME_1,P_PRICE_1 P_PRICE_1 from (select * from (select count(p.P_NAME_1) c,p.P_NAME_1 P_NAME_1 from store s inner join product p on s.S_BRAND_NAME = p.S_BRAND_NAME inner join RESERVATION r on r.R_STORE_NAME = p.S_BRAND_NAME where s.s_category = #{value} group by p.P_NAME_1 order by c desc) where rownum<=4)c inner join product p on c.P_NAME_1=p.P_NAME_1
